data: {"generalSituation":"The easterly airstream now affecting the coast of Guangdong will be replaced by a humid southerly airstream in the next couple of days. It will be warm during the day and misty in the morning and at night over the region. A cold front is expected to move across the coast of southern China on Monday night to Tuesday at first. There will be showers over the region. Under the influence of the associated northeast monsoon, it will slightly cooler in the morning and the weather will improve gradually over the coast of Guangdong in the middle to latter parts of next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260301","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East to southeast force 4, occasionally force 5 at first, becoming south force 3.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two showers at first. Coastal mist in the morning and at night.
